actionable_tasks.title: Frontend UI Completion: Spotify Authentication Interface
actionable_tasks.description: Implement and finalize the Spotify OAuth login and authentication UI, ensuring users can securely connect their Spotify accounts from the frontend.
implementation_steps: Review current Spotify OAuth flow and identify missing UI elements.
Add or update login button and authentication status indicator.
Handle OAuth redirect and token storage in frontend state.
Test the flow with a real Spotify account to ensure successful authentication and error handling.

actionable_tasks.title: Fix Unused Variables in High-Change Backend Modules
actionable_tasks.description: Scan and remove unused variables in backend modules with high change rates, starting with 'src/api/routes/*' and 'src/chat/*', to improve code quality and maintainability.
implementation_steps: Run ESLint or similar linter on the specified directories.
Identify and remove or refactor unused variable declarations.
Re-run tests to ensure no regressions.
Commit changes with clear messages referencing code quality improvements.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Quality Maintenance Scripts to package.json
actionable_tasks.description: Ensure 'lint', 'security:audit', and 'quality:check' scripts are present in package.json for ongoing code health monitoring.
implementation_steps: Open package.json and check for existing scripts.
Add or update scripts for linting, security audit (e.g., 'npm audit'), and quality checks.
Test each script to confirm correct operation.
Document script usage in README.md if not already present.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Jest Integration/Security Tests for MCP Endpoints
actionable_tasks.description: Write additional Jest tests to cover MCP server endpoints and provider health checks, improving automated test coverage and reliability.
implementation_steps: Identify MCP endpoints and provider health check logic.
Write new Jest test cases for endpoint responses, error handling, and edge cases.
Run tests and ensure all pass.
Refactor code as needed based on test results.
